retrieved_examples.nl: If f: ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is entire and f' is never zero, then f is injective.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f is differentiable at a and f' a ‚â† 0 then f is locally injective.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-
Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(p) ‚â† 0 for some p ‚àà U.
Then there exists an open neighborhood V of p such that f(V) is open and f|_V is injective.
-/

theorem holomorphic_nonzero_derivative_locally_injective {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U)
  {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U) {p : ‚ÑÇ} (hp : p ‚àà U) (h : deriv f p ‚â† 0) :
  ‚àÉ V : Set ‚ÑÇ, p ‚àà V ‚àß IsOpen V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß IsOpen (f '' V) ‚àß Set.InjOn f V := by sorry
